file_content.text: Back in the undercity, they reproduced only by infecting us, but now, there are more every day.
We lose people to them, a few every year, but only as meat. The serum the upworlder brought has held true. We do not sicken.
But now the serum is gone. We have had four infants born who could not be immunized. All boys.
We will not be able to protect them forever. We need our full strength to defend the tribe.
Maybe the immunity was inherited. Maybe we do not need to worry that a bite, a scratch, will turn our children against us.
Maybe I do not need to fear for my son....
[This doesn't seem like a natural rock formation. It looks like there is something buried here.]
